channel.title: Your career/life/job?
channel.description:
Heya aighttt? Well what do you want to do when you are older, or perhaps you are older and have your job (if so what did you want to be when you were younger?)
When i was younger i didn't really have many thoughts on what job i wanted. (im 15) Right now i have my heart set on commercial flying (e.g. flying people to their holiday destinations). But to get there i have to get 5 Good Gcse grades (C or above) and then get 2 A-levels (above C grade). then i will go to university and probably study maths or chemistry then go apply for the Royal Airforce. After serving with the airforce for the shortest ammount of time (12 years) i will apply to join a commercial airline fleet (such as brittish airways or easyjet(hopefully not as gay)) then i will grow old a die :) happy happy happy.
So thats what i want to do... what about you guys? Do you want to be a fireman? ;). Post what you want to be, or perhaps you'd rather post how you wish your life to go (like i did). Shoop da woop. [size=40pt]Step three: Profit![/size]

item.title: Your career/life/job?
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

i plan to finish highschool, then go to collage and work on the family farm (becoming an animal breeder) but i have great intrest in astronomy, but i can’t afford to go to higher studies on that.

Read full topic

item.title: Your career/life/job?
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

k00dr what the heck, I’m very far from pacifist. I definitely am not an immigrant either.

I have nothing against the military service. I just wanted to point out that people in Finland seem to think that mandatory military service is actually a good thing. Most people in foreign countries could feel like it’s something horrible we have to do.

davidude, the minimum service time is six months. Other options are nine months (that’s how long I’m planning to stay, the navy FTW) and 12 months. Also, we have to stay there 24/7. Sometimes we get a weekend off though.

Read full topic

item.title: Your career/life/job?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:30, topic:106428”][quote author=Ca1lum link=topic=152374.msg1446005#msg1446005 date=1181233142]
I wanna be a jeegalo ;D
[/quote]
what the hell is that?[/quote]

Definition of Gigolo: Prostitution is the sale of sexual services (examples: oral sex, sexual intercourse) for money. A person selling sexual services is a prostitute, a type of sex worker. In a more general sense of the word, anyone selling their services for a cause thought to be unworthy can be described as prostituting themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: Your career/life/job?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Kmb, post:21, topic:106428”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=152374.msg1441929#msg1441929 date=1181167134]

I work as a “storeroom man” for two months more. I’ll finish my senior secondary school next year, after that, I have to complete my compulsory military service.

After the military service I either go to a college to study IT or get a new job.

why do you have to do compulsary military service? do you live in life some random country?
[/quote]

I do actually. Finland for the lose.

http://www.hs.fi/english/article/Poll+shows+overwhelming+support+for+compulsory+military+service/1101979432639
This is a weird country.[/quote]
damn well that kinda sucks, but i suppose its ok, how long have u gotta serve for?

Read full topic
